init-param.param-value:
[main] realmA = org.ecocean.security.ShepherdRealm roles.unauthorizedUrl = /accessDenied.jsp authcBasicWildbook = org.ecocean.security.WildbookBasicHttpAuthenticationFilter authc.loginUrl = /react/login
[filters]
[urls] # NOTE: Rules are processed in order - first match wins # This configuration is from web-reorganized.xml (consolidation of duplicates)
# ===== REST ===== /rest/** = authcBasicWildbook,roles[researcher] #/xxxapi/** = authcBasicWildbook,roles[rest-readonly] /LightRest/** = authcBasicWildbook,roles[researcher]
# ===== v3 API Security ===== /api/v3/bulk-import = authc /api/v3/bulk-import/** = authc /api/v3/bulk-export = authc /api/v3/bulk-export/** = authc
# ===== Appadmin ===== /appadmin/dataIntegrity.jsp = authc /appadmin/iaBreakdownBySpecies.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /appadmin/sharedAnnotations.jsp = authc /appadmin/duplicateAnnotations.jsp = authc /appadmin/dataValuesCheck.jsp = authc /appadmin/scanTaskAdmin.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /appadmin/users.jsp = authc, roles[orgAdmin] /appadmin/automatedUserReconciliation.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/iaSpeciesDiff.jsp = authcBasicWildbook,roles[rest] /appadmin/resendBulkImportID.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /appadmin/consolidateDuplicateUsers.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/consolidATEDuplicateUsersChecker.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/consolidateDuplicateUsersSandbox.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/kwAdmin.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/batch* = authc, roles[admin] /appadmin/** = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Import Operations ===== /import/** = authc, roles[researcher] /ImportSRGD = authc, roles[admin] /ImportAccess = authc, roles[admin] /StandardImport = authc, roles[admin] /FixStandardImport = authc, roles[admin] /ImportTaskDetection = authc, roles[admin] /imports.jsp = authc /DeleteImportTask = authc, roles[researcher] /BatchUpload/** = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Export Operations ===== /GenePopExport = authc, roles[researcher] /SOCPROGExport = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportGeneGISFormat = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportKML = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportExcelFile = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterAnnotationExportExcelFile = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportMetadataExcel = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportShapefile = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportEmailAddresses = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSearchExportMetadataExcel = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSearchExportGtm = authc, roles[researcher] /SimpleCMROutput = authc, roles[researcher] /MarkRecaptureEncounters = authc, roles[researcher] /GenalexExportCodominantMSDataBySize = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSearchExportCapture = authc, roles[researcher] /CRCExportReport = authc, roles[researcher] /KinalyzerExport = authc, roles[researcher] /ExportWekaPredictorARFF = authc, roles[admin] /occurrenceExportSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportCOCO = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Search ===== /encounters/thumbnailSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/encounterSearch.jsp = roles[researcher] /encounters/searchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/searchResultsAnalysis.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/mappedSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/mappedSearchResultsSex.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/mappedSearchResultsHaplotype.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/exportSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/imageViewer.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/searchComparison.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/searchComparisonResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearch.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearchResults.jsp = authc /individualSearchResultsExport.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearchResultsAnalysis.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualMappedSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualThumbnailSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /occurrenceSearch.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /occurrence.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /occurrenceSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Individual Management ===== /IndividualSetNickName = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetName = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetAlternateID = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualRemoveEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddFile = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualRemoveDataFile = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddComment = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetSex = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetYearOfBirth = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetYearOfDeath = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualCreateForProject = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddIncrementalProjectId = authc, roles[researcher] /MergeIndividual = authc, roles[researcher] /ScheduledIndividualMergeUpdate = authc, roles[researcher] /GetIndividualSearchGoogleMapsPoints = authc, roles[researcher] /merge.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /mergeComplete.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
/gallery.jsp = authc /pictureBook.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Encounter Management ===== /EncounterSetAlternateID = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetState = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetScarring = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetGPS = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetVerbatimEventDate = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetLifeStage = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetCountry = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetTissueSample = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetSubmitterID = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetTapirLinkExposure = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterRemoveTissueSample = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterRemoveImage = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetGenusSpecies = authc, roles[researcher] #/EncounterSetInformOthers = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterResetDate = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetLocation = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetLocationID = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetSex = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetMaximumDepth = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetMaximumElevation = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetOccurrenceRemarks = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetPatterningCode = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetReleaseDate = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetMeasurements = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetTags = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetDynamicProperty = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetMatchedBy = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetLivingStatus = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetSurveyAndTrack = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterDelete = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetObservation = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterVMData = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterRemoveUser = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterAddUser = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetString = authc /EncounterRemoveAnnotation = authc, roles[researcher] /GetEncounterSearchGoogleMapsPoints = authc, roles[researcher] /RemoveDynamicProperty = authc, roles[researcher] /ResurrectDeletedEncounter = authc, roles[admin]
#/encounters/encounter.jsp = authc /encounters/encounterMediaGallery.jsp = authc /encounters/projectManagement.jsp = authc /encounters/encounterSpotTool.jsp = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /encounters/encounterSpotVisualizer.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/manualAnnotation.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/encounterVM.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Spots ===== /SubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /InterconnectSubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /interconnectSubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /SubmitSpotsAndImage = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /SubmitSpotsAndTransformImage = authc,roles[researcher] /EncounterAddSpotFile = authc, roles[identifier] /EncounterRemoveSpots = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Occurrence Management ===== /OccurrenceCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceRemoveEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceAddEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetMetadataField = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetIndividualCount = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetGroupBehavior = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetLatitudeLongitude = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetObservation = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetSurveyAndTrack = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Tissue Sample Management ===== /TissueSampleSetHaplotype = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetMeasurement = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveHaplotype = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveBiologicalMeasurement = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetMicrosatelliteMarkers = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveMicrosatelliteMarkers = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetSexAnalysis = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveSexAnalysis = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Relationship Management ===== /RelationshipCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /RelationshipDelete = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Survey Management ===== /surveys/survey.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /surveys/createSurvey.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /surveys/surveySearch.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /surveys/surveySearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /SurveyCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /SubmitSurvey = authc, roles[researcher] /SurveySetObservation = authc, roles[researcher] /AddSurveyTrackToSurvey = authc, roles[researcher] /AddOccToTrack = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Project Management ===== /projects/projectList.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /projects/project.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /projects/createProject.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /ProjectCreate = authc /ProjectDelete = authc /ProjectGet = authc /ProjectUpdate = authc /ProjectIA = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== User Management ===== /welcome.jsp = authc /myAccount.jsp = authc /myUsers.jsp = authc /UserCreate = authc, roles[orgAdmin] /UserCheck = authc /UserDelete = authc, roles[admin] /UserResetAcceptedUserAgreement = authc, roles[admin] #/UpdateEmailAddress = authc, roles[admin] #/RemoveEmailAddress = authc, roles[admin] /UserSelfUpdate = authc /UserAddProfileImage = authc /UserRemoveProfileImage = authc /MyAccountAddProfileImage = authc /MyAccountRemoveProfileImage = authc /UserGetNotifications = authc /UserGetSimpleJSON = authc /UserPreferences = authc
# ===== Org Management ===== /editOrg.jsp = authc, roles[admin] /OrganizationEdit = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Media Asset Management ===== /MediaAssetCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /MediaAssetsForUser = authc /MediaAssetAttach = authc, roles[researcher] /MediaAssetModify = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Workspace Management ===== /WorkspaceServer = authc, roles[researcher] /WorkspacesForUser = authc, roles[researcher] /WorkspaceDelete = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Collaboration ===== /Collaborate = authc /MembershipCreate = authc /MembershipDelete = authc
# ===== Keywords ===== /RestKeyword = authc, roles[researcher] /AddLabeledKeyword = authc, roles[researcher] /KeywordHandler = authc, roles[admin] # /SinglePhotoVideoRemoveKeyword = authc, roles[researcher] # /SinglePhotoVideoAddKeyword = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Annotation Management ===== /AnnotationEdit = authc, roles[admin] /AnnotationSetMatchAgainst = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Logs and System Admin ===== /logs/** = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Mass Operations ===== #/MassSetInformOthers = authc, roles[admin] /MassExposeGBIF = authc, roles[admin] /MassSetLocationCodeFromLocationString = authc, roles[admin] /MassSwapLocationCode = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== System Reset/Recovery ===== /ResetCommonConfiguration = authc, roles[admin]
# ===== Translation ===== /TranslateQuery = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== CMR Sessions ===== /SimpleCMRSpecifySessions.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
# ===== Legacy/Interconnect ===== /interconnect/mac/Interconnect.jar = authc, roles[researcher]

servlet.description: Serves the openapi.yaml spec and Swagger UI documentation
Log in user using username and password provided
